author: Subha J Rao
title: How you can help weavers and artisans during the lockdown
description: How handloom enterprises are helping their artisans cope with the Covid lockdown
content: A few weeks ago, Hyderabad-based Abhihaara Social Enterprise was gearing up to participate in the Delhi Crafts Councils Kairi exhibition (set to begin on March 19). Like most events across the city, this too was cancelled due to Covid-19. Now Sudha Rani Mulla… [+3553 chars]
